title: Parts of Caribbean island of St. Vincent unrecognizable after volcano erupts
description: For over two weeks, a volcano on the island of St. Vincent has erupted with unrelenting fury. Now, residents don't even recognize their home.

title: Biden declares massacre of Armenians as genocide
description: • What to know about the mass killings

title: Acosta: 'Big lie' spreaders are denying realities of race
description: CNN's Jim Acosta spells out why he says the Fox News hosts and GOP lawmakers pedaling the "big lie" about the 2020 presidential election are spreading a new, more toxic falsehood.

title: 'Jersey Shore' star Ronnie Ortiz-Magro arrested on domestic violence allegation
description: Ronnie Ortiz-Magro, a cast member of MTV's reality television show "Jersey Shore," has been arrested on a domestic violence allegation, according to the Los Angeles Police Department.

title: Looking for a job? Make sure it's real first
description: Looking for a job during the coronavirus pandemic has proven to be much harder than in normal times.

title: Elon Musk will host SNL in May
description: Live from New York, it's ... Elon Musk?

title: Rudy Giuliani and the MyPillow Guy win Razzie Awards for worst in cinema
description: After a year that didn't go as planned for anyone, Rudy Giuliani and Mike Lindell, aka the "MyPillow Guy," are among the winners -- if you can call them that -- of the 41st Golden Raspberry Awards, which are handed out to the worst in cinema every year.

title: Biden officially recognizes the massacre of Armenians in World War I as a genocide
DOJ: Trump's election lies could incite more violence
description: Former President Donald Trump's continued promotion of the "big lie" about the 2020 election could still incite his followers to violence, the Justice Department and judges noted repeatedly this week, as courts weigh the future dangerousness of US Capitol riot defendants.

title: As 100 days mark approaches, Biden must consider how he moves forward on racial justice
Man arrested on suspicion of infecting 22 people with Covid-19
description: A man in the town of Manacor on the Spanish island of Mallorca has been arrested on suspicion of infecting 22 people with Covid-19, according to the Spanish National Police.

title: Astronauts welcome new crew aboard the ISS
description: A SpaceX Crew Dragon spacecraft — carrying four astronauts from three countries — docked with the International Space Station and was welcomed by the crew they're relieving ahead of their six-month stay in space.

title: What a hoot: TikToker turns bird calls into club-worthy beats
description: Music producer So Wylie has become a birding community sensation. Her skill? Mixing wild bird calls with sick beats. Here's how she does it.

title: SE Asian nations say consensus reached on ending Myanmar crisis
description: Gen. Min Aung Hlaing, who led the military takeover that sparked turmoil in Myanmar, arrived in Jakarta on Saturday for a meeting of Southeast Asian leaders seeking to forge a path to end violence in the country.

title: What could police reform look like?
description: Derek Chauvin's conviction for murder brought home the issue of police misconduct. But what can be done to fix the problem?

title: SpaceX delivers 4 astronauts to the ISS
description: A SpaceX Crew Dragon spacecraft — carrying four astronauts from three countries — docked with the International Space Station early Saturday morning ET, beginning the crew's six-month stay in space.

title: Novak Djokovic says he hopes Covid-19 vaccine will not be mandatory for players
description: World No. 1 Novak Djokovic says he hopes Covid-19 vaccines will not be mandatory for tennis players on tour.

title: Infertility advice: Experts share ways to cope
description: 1 in 8 couples struggle with infertility in the US according to the CDC. CNN's Alisyn Camerota and Chloe Melas talk with fertility specialist Dr. Tia Jackson-Bey about what they can do to improve their emotional health and gain better access to treatment.

title: Protests sparked by Sarah Everard killing target controversial policing bill
description: Standing at the feet of the early 20th century feminist Millicent Fawcett -- the only woman to be honored with a statue in the UK's Parliament Square -- I held the microphone up as high as I could to capture the impassioned words of her present-day successors.

title: Analysis: A gap is growing between Democrats and Republicans on who's getting vaccinated
description: As the pace of daily vaccinations slides in the US, the Biden administration is directing fresh urgency to one of the biggest political challenges it faces in stopping the spread of the coronavirus: tackling vaccine hesitancy, particularly among conservative and rural voters in the Southeast and Mountain West.

title: Tourist-starved Greece takes a gigantic leap of faith on Covid
description: Teenage models Lydia-Angel Beach and Charlotte Claussen are seated on Monastiraki Square drinking in the warm Athens sunshine, having just sated their post-casting hunger with a juicy takeout souvlaki from classic kebab joint Thanasis.

title: No respite in India as country sets Covid-19 infection record for third straight day
description: India reported 346,786 new cases of Covid-19 on Saturday -- the third day in a row the country has set a world record for infections during the coronavirus pandemic, according to government and scientific tallies.

title: The European Super League was three years in making. It took 48 hours to unravel
description: "Greed," money and power.

title: Daunte Wright's family has received threats following his death, attorney says
description: Following the fatal police shooting of Daunte Wright in Brooklyn Center, Minnesota, his family has received death threats, an attorney for the mother of his child said Friday.

title: Andrew Brown Jr.'s family met with the sheriff, but were not shown bodycam footage of his death
description: The family of Andrew Brown Jr. said they met with the sheriff of Elizabeth City, North Carolina, on Friday but were not shown the body camera footage of his death that many in the community have demanded.

title: The look in Derek Chauvin's eyes was something worse than hate
description: Images and soundbites from the Derek Chauvin trial will linger in people's memories for years. But there is one heart-wrenching image that stands above the rest.

title: Terror in England as dozens of much-loved trees are felled in the dead of night
description: On a typical day, the picturesque district of Elmbridge would fit all the descriptors of any well-to-do English countryside locale: It's quiet, green and safe, a world away from the bustle of nearby London, and its residents take pride in its leafy landscapes and riverside views.

title: What '90 Day Fiance' teaches us about love -- and the US visa process
description: Every Sunday night, "90 Day Fiance" or one of its popular spinoffs takes TV viewers on a chaotic journey through romance, culture clashes and the American immigration system.

title: Myanmar junta chief arrives for talks with Southeast Asian leaders
Caitlyn Jenner announces run for California governor in likely recall election
description: Caitlyn Jenner, the former Olympian and reality TV star, announced Friday she plans to run to replace California Democratic Gov. Gavin Newsom in an expected recall election later this year.

title: Japan's QAnon disciples aren't letting Trump's loss quash their mission
description: Hiromi spent most of her life feeling trapped.

title: The problem with the big climate pledges we've heard this week
description: It's been a big week for climate. US President Joe Biden's new emission cutting target has sparked a game of climate one-upmanship among leaders of the world's most polluting countries.

title: See girl's emotional reunion with grandmother for 75th birthday
description: CNN's Chris Cuomo speaks with three family members who were reunited after 14 months for the grandmother's 75th birthday after the two adults received their Covid-19 vaccines.

title: UPS driver rescues young boy pinned under heavy package
description: Max Pratt likes to help his mom and dad by bringing in the packages delivered to their Oak Park, Illinois, home.
